title: Mage
description: A person who wields magical powers derived from supernatural or occult sources.
apple_vendor_description: The mage emoji on Apple devices portrays a figure of arcane power and wisdom, often depicted with a flowing robe and a mystical aura, ready to cast a spell. Apple's design imbues this character with a sense of gravitas, utilizing deep, rich colors and dramatic lighting to highlight the intricate details of their attire and the magic they command. This emoji is perfect for conveying fantasy, mystery, or the idea of possessing special knowledge or abilities in digital exchanges.
